ch0093_00_staff_center/3203_0701_01_10:
Welcome!
Feel free to check your current area information
right over here.
ch0093_00_staff_center/3203_0701_02_10: We hope to serve you again!
ch0093_00_staff_center/3204_0701_01_10: Welcome! How can I help you today?
ch0093_00_staff_center/3204_0302_03_10:
Could you show me what area info
is available?
ch0093_00_staff_center/3204_0701_04_10: We hope to serve you again!
ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_01_10:
Does anyone want to
go exploring?
ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_02_10:
Today is a perfect day
for an adventure.
ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_03_10:
Maybe I should do some
exploring, too...
ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_05_10:
When it comes to area
info, I’m your girl!
ch0093_00_staff_center/3301_1031_07_10:
Aw... I wish I had a
partner Pokémon, too...
ch0093_00_staff_center/3401_0701_01_10:
Seems like you’re achieving great things these
days! I hear there’s someone who wants to
meet you!
ch0093_00_staff_center/3402_0701_01_10: I’ve got new info for you—hot off the presses!
ch0093_00_staff_center/3501_1031_01_10:
I’ve got to share this
info, and fast!
ch0093_00_staff_center/3501_1031_02_10:
The faster this info gets
out, the better...
